name: Microscopic Fighting Championship Manager
description:
[This game was made in 4h30 as a submission to Trijam 131]

Breed specimens with desirable traits to create an unstoppable fighting team!

Top right is the Shop, drag specimens from there to buy them.

On the bottom is your Roster, these are the specimens that'll fight in the next fight.

On the top left is the Breeder, breed two specimens to make one with mixed traits plus some random mutations.

How many waves can you beat? Let me know.
